name: Nirav Shah
bio:
We are dealing with more than 800 Doctors and Hospitals satisfactorily for 40 years. PADMAVATI Enterprise is a one-stop solution for Designing, Printing, and Branding only for Health Care.

We believe that a doctor is a hard-working social entrepreneur. We are here to share the load with you.
location_text: 7, 38, Patrakar Colony, Vijay Nagar, Naranpura, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 380013

name: Kahaan Shah
bio: Hi, I am a Computer Science student passionate about digital logic, electronics, and macroeconomics. Currently working on open-economy macroeconomic models and volunteering for social causes in Ahmedabad.
